about_the_game: This is the unofficial version of Pak64.German, which evolved from pak64, when original images were replaced by typical German versions. You will meet brick and wooden houses, German vehicles and trees, and brew beer too. This pak is the most challenging to play and has the most consistent and most homogeneous graphics.
detailed_description: This is the unofficial version of Pak64.German, which evolved from pak64, when original images were replaced by typical German versions. You will meet brick and wooden houses, German vehicles and trees, and brew beer too. This pak is the most challenging to play and has the most consistent and most homogeneous graphics.
name: Simutrans - Pak64.German
short_description: Pak64.German evolved from pak64, when original images were replaced by typical German versions. You will meet brick and wooden houses, German vehicles and trees, and brew beer too. This pak is the most challenging to play and has the most consistent and most homogeneous graphics.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Hungarian, Japanese
